parameters.name: IsDefault
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query the default subtitle template. Valid values:

*   true

*   false

    **

    **Note **The default template includes the built-in parameter configurations. You can specify the copyFrom parameter when you call the AddLiveAISubtitle operation to use the default template.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: \[1,100].

parameters.name: SubtitleId
parameters.description: The ID of the subtitle template.

parameters.name: SubtitleName
parameters.description: The name of the subtitle template. The name can contain only digits, letters, and hyphens (-). The name cannot start with a hyphen.
